A good answer might be:

No. You can invent variations on the basic rule to create different patterns.

End of the Chapter

A Java applet that draws a snowflake is described in chapter 74.

Since no two identical snowflakes have been found in Nature, it is clear that there are many possible variations of the basic rule.
